name: Guidance of the King of the Kaiju
text: You can control more than 1 "Kaiju" monster. All "Kaiju" monsters gain 500 ATK. Each time a card(s) is tributed: Place 1 Kaiju Counter on this card for each card tributed (max 5). You can remove 3 Kaiju Counters from this card; return 1 "Kaiju" monster on the field to its owner's hand.
